DOC.HEADLINE: DOWNTIME : BODY WATCH ; AT_HOME ON THE SEA
DOC.TEXT: Sailing alone soothes me because the sea is fair , not cruel.It judges only your ability . It does not care who or what you are . It does not ask your age , color , sex , address , sexual orientation , education or IQ , but only your competence . It requires only that you can sail . If you can , you survive . If you can ' t , better stay ashore . that ' s fair , more fair than most of us experience on land . And refreshing . -- C.E. ZOERNER JR. , Manhattan Beach
